column4: does anyone know how to make smaller the panel where i got the ubuntu menu? i can't make it smaller than 24px...
that's about as small as it gets, ubfortunately
no way to make it smaller? it's way too big...
don't know why they've done that...
that is not what i want, i want to see it
I understand - but gnome won't do it as far as I know
u think it coudl be cause of the ubuntu logo?
choose to not show icons on menus
ah, OK - not many people would like that I guess
yeah i know, but it s a solution, i guess resizing that icon would made the trick
